title: Drawing, "Project for the plan of a circular platter", ca. 1810–25
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in reddish ink, lower right: No. 4
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: A palmette decoration is alternatively suggested for the outer moulding; shaped squarely.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for the plan of a circular platter", ca. 1810–25.
ca. 1810–25. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-343.
